Interface StreamedNettyRequestArgumentBinder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - A type
All Superinterfaces:
ArgumentBinder<T, HttpRequest<?>>, RequestArgumentBinder<T>
public interface StreamedNettyRequestArgumentBinder<T> extends RequestArgumentBinder<T>
A version of RequestArgumentBinder that requires NettyHttpRequest and StreamedHttpRequest.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Denis Stepanov
